Sentencas: The processing of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) often involves co-sintering of multi-layered stacks.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of tape cast nickel-based anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells before and after reduction in hydrogen

Sentencas: In the case of SOFCs incorporating Ni-based anodes, hydrogen reduction of the anode usually takes place during the first service cycle of operation or conditioning.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of tape cast nickel-based anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells before and after reduction in hydrogen

Sentencas: Initial reduction causes changes in the chemistry, microstructure and properties of the Ni-based anode material, which in turn induce mechanical stresses in the cell.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of tape cast nickel-based anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells before and after reduction in hydrogen

Sentencas: In this study the elastic moduli, biaxial strength and fracture toughness of unreduced (NiO-YSZ) and reduced (Ni-YSZ) anode were determined as functions of porosity.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of tape cast nickel-based anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells before and after reduction in hydrogen

Sentencas: Elastic properties were determined by impulse excitation at ambient temperature.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of tape cast nickel-based anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells before and after reduction in hydrogen

Sentencas: Biaxial strength and fracture toughness were determined at ambient temperature by the ring-on-ring and double torsion test methods, respectively.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of tape cast nickel-based anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells before and after reduction in hydrogen

Sentencas: It was found that the mechanical properties of unreduced and reduced Ni-based anode materials depend strongly on porosity.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of tape cast nickel-based anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells before and after reduction in hydrogen

Sentencas: Property-porosity trends were found to be in good agreement with prediction of the minimum solid area model.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of tape cast nickel-based anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells before and after reduction in hydrogen

Sentencas: Results presented in this study show that the elastic moduli and biaxial strength of the Ni-based anode material decreases after reduction in hydrogen while fracture toughness increases after reduction due to formation of ductile Ni-metal phase.
Titulo: Mechanical properties of tape cast nickel-based anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells before and after reduction in hydrogen

Titulo: Mechanical properties of tape cast nickel-based anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells before and after reduction in hydrogen
